credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Sheath for fork and knife
description:
Carved wooden sheath for two implements. The body of the sheath divided in four vertical parts. Front has six carved biblical scenes, at the bottom an angel holding a shield. On the back six scenes of men feasting, drinking, etc. On the two sides, six apostles with their emblems, "WGW" carved on one side, "1589" on the reverse.

Plain rectangular silver cap with rounded sides, slides on to sheath (1985-103-42-a). [Replaced?]
name: Sheath for fork and knife
